description:
Great Range of 4x4 Bullbars in Coffs Harbour

Bullbars are an essential upgrade for your 4WD vehicle. These days, bullbars are modern and stylish. Not only do they offer excellent protection for the front end of your vehicle and provide mounting points for lights, winches and aerials, they also significantly enhance your 4WD vehicle's look. At Automax 4x4, we offer the best 4x4 bullbars in Coffs Harbour. The quality brands we stock are Rhino 4x4, AFN, Uneek, Rival by Drivetech, and Rockarmour. Also, all our bullbars are ADR compliant and compatible with SRS airbags.

[su_spoiler title="More"]

We Fit 4x4 Bullbars in Coffs Harbour

Call into our 4x4 accessory showroom in Coffs Harbour, and we'll give you solid advice on which bullbar is best for you and your vehicle. We can discuss the kind of 4WD driving adventures you're planning to get into and chat about all your options. Moreover, because we have a full workshop, we'll provide expert fitting of your chosen bullbar too. Also, if you've chosen any other 4x4 accessories, such as Stedi lights, a winch, an aerial, we can fit those at the same time.

We Sell ADR Standards Approved 4x4 Bullbars in Coffs Harbour

The 4x4 bullbar you choose must be compliant with ADR standards. The Australian Design Rules (ADR) are the national standards for vehicle safety. Specifically, Section 3.1 of the ADR states that any vehicle fitted with a Vehicle Frontal Protection System (VFPS) must continue to comply with ADR standards. Rest assured, all 4x4 bullbars that we supply and fit are fully compliant.

Automax 4x4 Accessories and Services

As a comprehensive one-stop-shop for everything 4WD in Coffs Harbour, we offer the following services:

  • 4x4 Accessories advice, supply and fitting
  • 4x4 Bullbars from Rhino, AFN, Uneek, Rival by Drivetech, Rockarmour and More
  • 4x4 Rear Bars & Tow Bars including sales and fitting
  • 4x4 Sliders and Side steps, brands we stock are AFN, Rhino, Rockarmour
  • 4x4 Lighting. We offer the best 4WD LED Lighting by Stedi Lights
  • 4x4 Suspension by Outback Armour and Boss Air Suspension
  • 4x4 Winches & Recovery Gear by Runva, Rhino, Drivetech & Outback Armour
  • 4x4 Vehicle repair, servicing and 4WD upgrades in Coffs Harbour
Contact us today to explore our superior range of 4x4 Bullbars in Coffs Harbour.
[/su_spoiler]
